alert.note: Alert for Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 6:16PM CDT until September 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ogle County in north central Illinois... North central Lee County in north central Illinois... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ashton, or 7 miles west of Rochelle, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rochelle, Hillcrest, Ashton, and Chana. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
